column3:
Perturbed by the thoughts on my mind
no matter how hard I try to sever my love.
column6:
I can cut a thousand strands of hair
but I cannot sever the tangled threads of my mind.

column3: I could give away my crown for the beauty by my side,
column6:
Bowing with my hands clasped, I give away my throne.
Lowering my head, devoted to the beauty by my side.

column3:
but the wheel of fortune turns weals into woes,
and woes into weals.
column6:
The wheel of fate turns, granting blessings or misfortune.
Will it be destiny’s trial or reward?

column3:
No one is the master of their own destiny,
the vicissitudes throughout their life.
column6:
Heaven’s will cannot be known,
weaving together weals and woes.

column3:

who can break the spell of romance?

who can break the spell of romance?

column3: 皇上昨夜陪着沈贵人睡得有些晚
column6: Your Majesty stayed up late with Lady Shen last night.
Why didn't Your Majesty sleep in a bit?

column3: 高兴归高兴 早朝还得照旧
column6:
All the joy aside,
I had to hold court in the morning.
You didn't sleep well either, did you?
For one thing, I was overjoyed;

for another, I was instructing the Imperial Infirmary
to take good care of Lady Shen.
Your hard work is appreciated.
Noble Lady Shen...
Is there something Your Majesty needs?

column3: 朕想晋一晋沈贵人的位分
column6: I was thinking about promoting Noble Lady Shen.

column3: 沈贵人得皇上宠爱 又有了身孕
column6:
Lady Shen has been favored by Your Majesty,
and now she is pregnant.
Her promotion can be reasonably expected.

column3: 只是祖制并无嫔妃有孕或产子

column6:
But there's no precedent to promote a concubine
upon pregnancy or delivery.

column3: 倒不全是因为她身孕的缘故
column6: It's not entirely because of her pregnancy.
Her steady personality is a rarity.
That is true.
Compared to Lady Sourire's keen intellect,

column3: 倒显得沈贵人稳重大方
column6: Lady Shen is responsible and decorous.

column3: 皇上打算给沈贵人嫔位吧
column6:
Does Your Majesty intend to promote
Lady Shen to Concubine?

- She's worthy of the title.
- Absolutely.

column3: 咸福宫就有两位主位了
column6:
However, this would mean two Concubines
are the head of the Palace of Universal Happiness.

column3: 恐怕沈贵人有着身孕也不方便
column6:
I'm afraid it would be inconvenient for Lady Shen
to move to another palace during her pregnancy.

column3: 倒不如诞下皇子的时候

column6:
Instead, why don't we double her happiness
when she gives birth to an heir?
You are right.

column3: 只是朕总得赏她点什么吧
column6: But I feel obliged to reward her.
Jewelry would be too paltry.

Since her promotion is temporarily delayed,
I wish to give her an honorary name in advance.
Your Majesty must have a name in mind already.
I'm thinking of naming her Vertu [惠Hui].

column3: 形容沈贵人是恰如其分
column6: Virtuous and decorous - that perfectly describes her.

column3: 这莞贵人和沈贵人同为姐妹
column6: Lady Sourire and Lady Shen are like sisters.

column3: 这下可真算是平起平坐了
column6: Now they're truly on equal footing.

column3: 姐姐求子得子 当真是大喜啊
column6: Your wish has come true. What a joyous occasion!
I don't see the joy of it.

All of a sudden I'm restricted from
doing everything and going anywhere.
It's such a bore!

column3: 还有九个月呢 不过也快
column6: There are nine more [lunar] months to come.
But the time will fly by.

column3: 我听槿汐说 怀孕八个月的时候
column6: Jinxi said that in the eighth month of your pregnancy,

column3: 娘家的母亲就可以进宫亲自照拂
column6:
your mother can come to the palace
and take care of you.
A family reunion of three generations.
Really? That's wonderful!

column3: 我可是看上了你肚子里的那一位
column6: I’ve set my eyes on the baby in your belly.

When will you make me his honorary mother?
[a non-religious godmother]

column3: 还怕没人叫你额娘不成
column6: What use are you as an honorary mother?
You'll be a mother soon as well.

column3: 现下是男是女都还不知道呢
column6: We don't even know yet whether it's a boy or a girl.

column3: 无论男女 来者不拒

column6: I'll take anything!

I'm hoping for a prince I can rely on
for the rest of my life.

column3: 我瞧着皇上如今宠爱你的样子
无论男女他都会喜欢的
column6:
With the place you hold in His Majesty's heart,
he will love your child either way.

I'm afraid you'll be promoted
while you're still sitting the month [postpartum confinement].
Don't make fun of me.

column3: 我想起了一件很要紧的事
column6:
I wanted to tell you something important.
I remembered it when I woke up this morning.

column3: 如今哪里还有比你身孕

column6:
What could possibly be
more important than your pregnancy?
This is a serious matter.

column3: 华妃失势难免不会东山再起
column6:
Although Consort Fleur has lost power,
it's inevitable that she will rise again.

column3: 我怕你一个人应付不过来
column6:
I'm afraid that you won't
be able to manage her on your own.

column3: 咱们那位皇上也不是位专宠的人
column6:
Looking with unclouded eyes, I don't expect His Majesty
to devote himself to just one woman.

column3: 我是怕有人会拣这个空子占便宜
column6:
Someone might take advantage of
the vacancy during my pregnancy.

column3: 你的意思是要接陵容来
column6: Are you suggesting... that we bring Lingrong here?
Exactly.

column3: 你看你 上回还说陵容心狠
column6: Look at you!

column3: 这会儿又觉得她在好了
column6:
You were the one who called her ruthless.
Now you wish she was here.

column3: 你不知道 狠有狠的好处
column6: Well, being ruthless has its own benefits.
I don't want you to be on your own.

column3: 不至于有什么变故的时候
column6:
Let's get her here, so we won't be
at our wits' end if there is a crisis.

column3: 我会尽快和皇上提这件事
column6:
I will make the request to His Majesty
at his earliest convenience.
I don't believe he will refuse.

column3: 如今你是皇上跟前一等一的红人

column6:
Now that you're His Majesty's number-one concubine,
all your requests will be granted.

column3: 只是你这样小心筹谋难免伤身子
column6: But exerting yourself mentally can still harm your health.
The baby is your top priority.
You're right.
Sourire!
You've finally arrived.

- How was the trip?
- It was all right.

column3: 大热天的 姐姐怎么亲自站着
column6: You shouldn't have been waiting for me outside.

It's such a hot day.
I hope you are not affected by the heat.

column3: 对了 眉姐姐一句话

column6:
I was permitted to come here
all because Meizhuang put in a word for me.
How is she?

column3: 如今你来了 她更高兴
column6: She's well.

column3: 对了 我路上就听太监们说
column6: She's even happier now that you're here.

On the way here, the eunuchs were saying that His Majesty
indulges all of Meizhuang's desires after she became pregnant.

column3: 传闻不如一见 你见到她便知了
column6: "Seeing is believing." You'll see for yourself.

column3: 既然来了 先向皇上去请安吧
column6: But before that, we shall pay respects to His Majesty.
I'll follow your advice.

column3: 阿哥在日头下跪了大半日了
column6: Prince, you've been kneeling here for half a day now.

column3: 先回去吧 仔细中了暑气
column6: You should go back so as not to get sunstroke.
Mr. Su.

column3: 莞贵人吉祥 安答应吉祥
column6:
Peace to Lady Sourire.
Peace to Companion An.

column3: 苏公公 那孩子是谁啊
column6: Mr. Su, who is that child?

column3: 那是四阿哥 想求见皇上呢
column6:
That is the Fourth Prince.
He wishes to see His Majesty.
The Fourth Prince?
I've never heard of him.
He's been living here in the Summer Palace.

column3: 眼下皇上怕是也没心情
column6: Does His Majesty not have time to see the Fourth Prince?
I'm afraid His Majesty is not in the mood to see you two either.
My Ladies, you should come at another time.
Sourire... Shall we ...
go back for now?
Poor child!

column3: 为阿哥送一碗莲子百合解暑
column6:
Sir, may I trouble you to send the Fourth Prince
some lotus seed soup to relieve the summer heat?
I will, My Lady.
Now that you're here, the gardens will be even livelier.

I would not be able to come
were it not for the care of you and Meizhuang.
Has Consort Fleur mended fences with His Majesty?

She lives far away from His Majesty's residence.
They don't get to see each other a lot.
Peace to My Ladies.
I bow in respect before Your Highness Lady Sourire.
Peace and grace to Your Highness.

column3: 张嬷嬷 这位是莞贵人
column6: Madam Zhang, this is Noble Lady Sourire.
My Lady.
Please rise, Fourth Prince.

We've never met before.
How did you know who I am?

column3: 儿臣觉得莞娘娘十分亲切
column6:
Outside the Governance Hall, I could see Your Highness's
generous spirit even by a distant glimpse.

column3: 娘娘不是也认得儿臣吗
column6: That was how I recognized Your Highness.
And Your Highness knew me as well.
Likewise, I had the same impression of you.
I share an affinity with Your Highness.
Thank you for remembering me.
This is Companion An.
Peace to Your Highness.
That is very courteous of you, Fourth Prince.

column3: 你先回住处看看合不合心意
column6: Lingrong, how about you go and have a look at your residence?
I will go with you to visit Meizhuang later.

column3: 流朱 你陪安小主去
column6: I shall take my leave.

- Vermilion, you will go with her.
- Yes.

column3: 张嬷嬷 我和莞娘娘有话要说

column6:
Madam Zhang, I wish to have a word with Lady Sourire.
Can you stand aside?

column3: 张嬷嬷似乎很关心阿哥
column6: Madam Zhang seems to care a lot for you.

column3: 阿哥有什么话连张嬷嬷也回避
column6:
What would you like to say to me
that she can't even listen?

column3: 只因莞娘娘日日在皇阿玛身边
column6:
I hope Your Highness will forgive my intruding,
but I thought you could answer my question
because you know Imperial Father the best as his favorite concubine.

column3: 儿臣只想问莞娘娘一句话
column6: Your Highness, I simply wish to know ...

column3: 皇阿玛是不是不喜欢我
column6: Is it true that Imperial Father doesn't like me?

column3: 怎么会 你皇阿玛只是太忙了
column6:
Why would you think that way?
His Majesty is just too busy.

column3: 那为何皇阿玛年年把我扔在这里

column6:
But why has he been keeping me here
for all these years and never visited me?

column3: 也很少让我向他磕头请安

column6:
And he never lets me bow and pay respects to him
to fulfill my filial piety?

column3: 天下事太多了 皇上忙不过来
column6:
His Majesty is busy administering
all affairs under Heaven.

column3: 况且 阿哥虽然一直在园子里

column6: Although you've been living here and rarely seeing His Majesty,
he cares about you no less than the Fifth Prince.

column3: 你看五阿哥不也一直寄养在外吗
column6: The Fifth Prince has been living outside the Forbidden City as well.

column3: 五阿哥有他的额娘 我没有
column6: The Fifth Prince has his mother, but I don't.

column3: 我额娘身份低微 被人瞧不起
column6: My mother was disdained for her low birth.

column3: 我虽不知你额娘出身是否卑微
column6: A man's value comes from within himself.

column3: 但父母爱子之心人人皆是
column6: Although I know nothing about your mother,

column3: 别人如何轻贱你都不要紧
column6: I'm sure she loves you the same as every mother.

column3: 重要的是你自己别轻贱了自己
column6:
It doesn't matter what others think about you.
It's what you think of yourself that counts!

column3: 来日别人自然不敢轻贱你分毫
column6:
In the days to come, they will not dare to
have the least contempt for you.
For real?

column3: 阿哥若不信 自然也不会来问我
column6: You wouldn't have come to ask me if you didn't trust me.
I'm grateful for Your Highness's advice!

column3: 我与阿哥仅遥遥一面之缘
column6: But why would you trust me the first time we met?

column3: 能做皇阿玛宠妃的人一定不简单
column6:
I think a concubine wouldn't win
Imperial Father's favor for no reason.
And I heard Your Highness is not even afraid of Consort Fleur.

column3: 儿臣敬佩有勇有谋的人
column6: I admire you as a person possessing bravery and brains.

column3: 阿哥的赞誉我实在担当不起
column6: I do not deserve your compliments.

column3: 只是有一句话要跟阿哥说
column6: I hope you will remember this:

column3: 不如自己便是那样的人
column6: instead of admire someone, become them.
Is Imperial Father really very busy?
If so, I will administer the country for him when I grow up.
Aiya,
you must not say such things.

column3: 来 我带你去吃点心
column6: Would you like to go have some snacks?
Sure!

Jiuzhou Qingyan
[The Peaceful Nine States]

This is such a nice place!
It's so pleasant and cooling in here.

The music comes from the lake
and can be best appreciated here.

The highly-ranked nobles are only allowed
to join the palace's most important celebrations.

column3: 这些亲王贵眷我都不认得
column6: I do not recognize any of the lords and ladies.
Do you know who they are?

column3: 那是五爷恒亲王和他的侧福晋
column6:
That is Lord V,  State Prince Heng [prince of the first rank],
with his Prince Consort.

column3: 第一位的样子看上去好威严

column6:
The first one from the left looks very dignified.
He inspires awe in me.

column3: 不过见着对福晋却挺好
column6: But he seems very nice to his wife.
(State Prince Dun)

column3: 是先帝孝昭仁皇后的亲妹妹
column6:
That is Lord X, whose mother was the younger sister
of the prior emperor's empress.

column3: 身份贵重 自然不怒自威
column6: His lofty birth gives him an air of authority.

However, the prior emperor wasn't very fond of
Lord X for his notorious temper.

column3: 可是对福晋却是极其疼爱
column6: But Lord X is extremely nice to his wife.

column3: 都说威武不屈才是男子汉
column6: They say a real man is defined by his might,

column3: 我瞧着会疼人的才是男子汉呢
column6: but in my eyes, a real man is defined by his love for his family.

column3: 老十 朕先敬你与福晋一杯
column6:
Tenth brother, I'd like to make a toast
to you and your wife.
I thank Your Majesty.

Sourire, State Prince Dun seems
disrespectful to His Majesty.
Why is His Majesty so gracious to him?

After the nine princes' battle for the throne,
His Majesty must stabilize the government and the imperial family.

column3: 这个老十七不知道又见到了
什么新鲜玩意儿不肯挪步

column6:
I wonder what's keeping my seventeenth brother this time.
He still hasn't appeared.

column3: 皇上 您是知道十七哥的
column6: Your Majesty knows how he is.

He is bound by no rules.
[Venerable Prince Shen, the 21st prince of the prior emperor]
A family banquet isn't a big deal after all.

column3: 朕也看他逃席惯了 就由他吧
column6: He's usually missing for such occasions. I'll let him be.

column3: 惠贵人 这个发簪真是精致啊
column6: Lady Vertu, that is a very nice hairpin you're wearing.
Is it a new gift from the Empress Dowager?
Yes.

The Empress Dowager specially had the hairpin sent here
after hearing about Lady Vertu's pregnancy.

column3: 是多子多福 如意双全之意
column6:
The Two Gods of Harmony on the hairpin will
bless her with plentiful children and good fortune.

column3: 是太后怀十四爷的时候戴过
column6:
The Empress Dowager received the hairpin when she was
pregnant with Lord XIV [enemy and brother of the emperor].

column3: 由此可见 太后是多盼着

column6:
On that account, we can see how much the Empress Dowager
is looking forward to Lady Vertu's child.

column3: 到底是多俊的一个阿哥呢
column6: I can't wait to see what an adorable prince he will be.
Who says it's a prince?
I'm hoping for a princess who's as adorable as Wenyi.
Enjoy.
(Consort Honnête)

column3: 端妃娘娘驾到 端妃娘娘驾到
column6: Her Highness Consort Honnête.
Her Highness Consort Honnête.

column3: 臣妾祝皇上皇后万福金安
column6: May peace and grace be with Your Majesties.
Rise.
I thank Your Majesty.
Your Majesty has again found beauty.

column3: 端妃常年累月不见生人
所以还保留着当年的眼光啊
column6:
Consort Honnête, you haven't seen any new faces these years,
but you've kept the same eye.

column3: 外头太阳那么大你还赶过来了
column6: You shouldn't have come on such a scorching hot day.

We're just celebrating a birthday.
It's nothing of significance.

Wenyi's first birth anniversary is a joyous occasion.
I must come to celebrate for her.

column3: 臣妾好久也没有见温宜了
column6: I haven't seen Wenyi for a long time.

- Take your seat.
- I thank Your Majesty.

column3: 还是温宜公主满月的时候呢
column6:
It was at Wenyi's one-month banquet
when I last saw her.

column3: 快将公主抱去给娘娘看看
column6: Bring Wenyi to greet Her Highness quickly.

column3: 本宫有心啊 想抱一抱温宜
column6: I would really like to hold her in my arms.
But I don't have the strength to.
I don't want to make her fall.
Auspice.
That choker was part of your dowry.

column3: 怎能送她这么贵重的东西
column6: Why would you give such a valuable gift to a small child?
Your Majesty has a good memory.

column3: 只可惜呀 臣妾长年累月地病着
column6: Considering my persistent health condition,
it will be of no use if I keep it.

column3: 温宜她那么可爱 给她正好
column6: It is a perfect gift for the adorable Wenyi.

column3: 嫔妾替温宜谢过娘娘了
column6: I thank Your Highness on behalf of Wenyi.
My pleasure.

I wish to go out for a walk.

column3: 若皇上问起来 便说我即刻就回
column6: If His Majesty inquires, tell him I'll be back shortly.

column3: 歇会儿吧 我腿都走酸了
column6: Let's take a break here. My legs are sore from walking.
Mine as well.
Look, there are brocade carp.
Hold this for me.

column3: 小主 怎么把鞋脱了

column6:
- My Lady, why are you taking off your shoes?
- It's all right.

column3: 被人看见多不好 小主
column6: But what if someone sees you?

column3: 小主的脾气一点都没变

column6:
My Lady, you haven't changed at all.
Just as playful as you were back home.

column3: 你看 流朱 有那么多鱼
column6: Look, Vermilion, there are so many carp!
Great!
Let's go feel the water.
The water's rather cold.
Let's go down.

- I'm not going.
- There's nobody around.
My dress is new. I don't have the heart to soil it.
To soil it?
It's already soiled now!

column3: 小主 你得赔我两身衣服才行
column6: My Lady, you have to make me two more dresses!

column3: 在这儿等我 扶着我点
column6: You'll wait for me up here then.
Hold on to me.
Be careful.

column3: 小主 小主 小主
column6: My Lady!
Who are you?
Get back!

column3: 自己都成落汤鸡了 还顾别人
column6: Why do you care about me while you're almost a "drenched chicken"?
Who are you? How brazen of you!

column3: 来称赞佳人的皮肤白哲
column6:
Lord Li Yu described the hands of a lady as
"supple jade outstretched from emerald blue".
Today I learned that it is true.

column3: 可是我看不如用缥色玉纤纤
column6: But I think that is a more accurate description

column3: 更见玉足的雪白纤细之妙
column6: for a lady's soft and fair feet.
Get me my shoes.
Here.
Your Lordship must mind your manners.
My Lady...

Vermilion, greet Noble Prince Guo.
[prince of the second rank]

column3: 你没见过我 怎知道我是果郡王
column6:
We've never met before.
Why do you think I am Noble Prince Guo?

column3: 试问谁会一管长笛不离身
column6:
Whoever else in the palace would
always carry a flute on his person?

column3: 谁能饮得西域进贡的玫瑰醉
column6:
Whoever else could be drinking the tributary
Uygur Drunken Rose Liquor?

column3: 又有谁敢在宫中如此不拘
column6: And whoever else dares to be so impertinent?

column3: 我身上的酒味有那么重吗
column6: Do I reek heavily of alcohol?
My apologies.
Are you a new concubine of my brother?
This is Noble Lady Sourire.

column3: 嫔妾有所冒犯 请王爷勿要见怪
column6: I hope Your Lordship will forgive my offense.
